snippet: The Day: The Petraeus-Broadwell affair has been examined from almost every conceivable angle. On Monday night, a group of ethicists and writers joined the conversation.
abstract: The Day: The Petraeus-Broadwell affair has been examined from almost every conceivable angle. On Monday night, a group of ethicists and writers joined the conversation.

headline.main: After Petraeus and Broadwell, Considering the Ethics of Biographies
